H0.text: Which notorious murderer lived at 10 Rillington Place. Dennis Nilsen

H1.text: Which notorious murderer lived at 10 Rillington Place. Fred West

H2.text: Which notorious murderer lived at 10 Rillington Place. Peter Sutcliffe

H3.text: Which notorious murderer lived at 10 Rillington Place. John Christie

A4.text: John Reginald Halliday Christie (8 April 1899 – 15 July 1953) was an English serial killer and serial rapist active during the 1940s and early 1950s.

A5.text: He murdered at least eight people—including his wife Ethel—by strangling them inside his flat at 10 Rillington Place, Notting Hill, London.
